sentences.en: From the base of the rock on which I stood, a moss-covered ledge stuck into deep water.
sentences.cn: 从我所站立的岩石的底部，一个满是苔藓的暗礁伸进深水里。

sentences.en: He balanced precariously on the narrow window - ledge.
sentences.cn: 他在狭窄的窗台上很难保持平衡.

sentences.en: He eased himself along the ledge to reach the terrified boy.
sentences.cn: 他小心翼翼地沿着突出的檐向那惊惶失措的男孩靠近.

sentences.en: He leapt onto a ledge of rock.
He managed to cling on to a ledge 40ft down the rock face.
sentences.cn: 他设法紧紧地攀在了距岩壁顶端40英尺的岩礁上。

sentences.en: His feet found the window - ledge.
How can such a large quantity of know - ledge be acquired?
sentences.cn: 这么大量的知识怎样才能学到 呢 ?

sentences.en: I managed to pull myself up onto a wet, sloping ledge.
sentences.cn: 我终于爬上了一块潮湿倾斜的暗礁。

sentences.en: She had climbed onto the ledge outside his window.
sentences.cn: 她爬到了他窗外的窗台上。

sentences.en: Suddenly he struck his toe on a rocky ledge and fell.
sentences.cn: 突然他的脚趾绊在一块突出的岩石上,摔倒了.

sentences.en: The climber edged carefully along the narrow rock ledge.
sentences.cn: 爬山者沿着狭窄的岩架缓缓攀爬.

sentences.en: The climbers rested on a sheltered ledge jutting out from the cliff.
sentences.cn: 登山者在悬崖的岩棚上休息.

sentences.en: The ledge overhangs by several feet.
The phone was perched precariously on the window ledge.
sentences.cn: 电话放在窗台上,摇摇欲坠.

sentences.en: They paid out the line to lower him to the ledge.
sentences.cn: 他们放出绳子使他降到那块岩石的突出部分.

sentences.en: We crept carefully along the narrow ledge.
sentences.cn: 我们小心翼翼地沿着狭窄的岩架爬行。

sentences.en: We finally got at a ledge of rock near the summit.
sentences.cn: 我们最后到达了靠近峰顶的一块突出的岩崖.

trans.tran_en: a narrow flat piece of rock that sticks out on the side of a mountain or cliff
